name: AddSubsemigroup.mem_center_iff
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
inst✝ : AddSemigroup M
z : M
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (AddSubsemigroup.center M) z) (∀ (g : M), Eq (HAdd.hAdd g z) (HAdd.hAdd z g))
decl:
@[to_additive]
theorem mem_center_iff {z : M} : z ∈ center M ↔ ∀ g, g * z = z * g := by
  rw [← Semigroup.mem_center_iff]
  exact Iff.rfl

name: Subsemigroup.mem_center_iff
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
inst✝ : Semigroup M
z : M
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (Subsemigroup.center M) z) (∀ (g : M), Eq (HMul.hMul g z) (HMul.hMul z g))
decl:
@[to_additive]
theorem mem_center_iff {z : M} : z ∈ center M ↔ ∀ g, g * z = z * g := by
  rw [← Semigroup.mem_center_iff]
  exact Iff.rfl

name: Subsemigroup.center_eq_top
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommSemigroup M
⊢ Eq (Subsemigroup.center M) Top.top
decl:
@[to_additive (attr := simp)]
theorem center_eq_top : center M = ⊤ :=
  SetLike.coe_injective (Set.center_eq_univ M)

name: AddSubsemigroup.center_eq_top
initialProofState:
M : Type u_1
inst✝ : AddCommSemigroup M
⊢ Eq (AddSubsemigroup.center M) Top.top
decl:
@[to_additive (attr := simp)]
theorem center_eq_top : center M = ⊤ :=
  SetLike.coe_injective (Set.center_eq_univ M)
